zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理趋势]
zh.content:
当前雪崩币（AVAX/USD）价格为12.6833美元，近期走势表现出一定的震荡整理特征。24小时变化为-0.73%，显示出市场情绪较为平稳，但缺乏明显的方向性。高点与低点分别为12.7788和12.6738，说明价格在这些区间内反复波动，未能突破关键水平。

从技术指标来看，虽然RSI暂时不可用，但MACD显示出负值（-0.1205），表明短期内卖压仍然存在。SMA(20)为12.72105，价格在此均线附近波动，显示出可能的支撑位。若价格持续在此均线之上，则可能出现反弹的机会，但若跌破则需警惕进一步下行风险。

支撑位方面，12.6700美元附近可能是关键区域，若价格能够守住此位，则有望迎来反弹。阻力位则在12.8000美元附近，突破该区域将有助于价格恢复上涨势头。在当前市场环境下，建议投资者采取谨慎态度，关注价格在支撑与阻力间的波动，适时调整持仓策略。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Avalanche (AVAX) is currently trading at $12.6833, reflecting a slight decline of 0.73% over the past 24 hours. The price action has been relatively stable, with a high of $12.7788 and a low of $12.6738, suggesting a consolidation phase. This price range indicates that the market is currently digesting recent movements. Traders should closely monitor this range, as a breakout above $12.78 could signify bullish momentum, while a drop below $12.67 may indicate bearish sentiment.

The absence of the RSI(14) in the current analysis limits our ability to assess overbought or oversold conditions; however, the MACD reading of -0.1205 suggests that the momentum is leaning slightly negative. This may point to a potential for further downside unless buying pressure emerges. The SMA(20) at $12.72105 is also crucial, as it serves as a dynamic support level. A close below this moving average could trigger additional selling, while a bounce from this level could reinforce bullish sentiment.

In terms of support and resistance levels, traders should observe the $12.67 mark as immediate support. Should this level hold, a retest of the $12.78 resistance could be on the horizon. Conversely, if the price breaks below $12.67, the next support could be found around $12.50, which may attract buyers looking for value. Resistance above $12.78 may lead to an attempt to breach the psychological level of $13.00.

For trading strategies, a cautious approach is advisable. Traders may consider initiating long positions if the price successfully rebounds from $12.67 with increased volume, targeting the next resistance at $12.78. Conversely, those with a bearish outlook may look to sell on a confirmed break below $12.67, with a target toward $12.50. Risk management remains paramount, and traders should set stop-loss orders to mitigate potential losses in this volatile environment.
